name: Retaliation: Enemy Mine
description: Retaliation: Enemy Mine offers challenging reasoning in a fast, easy and greatly enjoyable format, with the mission of making the spirit of wargaming immediately available to everyone, casual gamers and seasoned strategists alike.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 128 MB available space

reviews.review_text: So I got this thinking it would be a decent strategy game. And it is ok. The controls work well, the rules function as a concept, the layout simple. However, this game is boring. It is not any fun. A game can work well, but still suck. The point is to be entertained. Probably won't ever play it again after about 1.5 hours of giving it my honest effort.
